info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 30 at 5:55AM CDT until April 30 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Norman OK
info.description:
FFWOUN
The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... South Central Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma...
* Until 900 AM CDT.
* At 555 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lawton, Cache, Elgin, Geronimo, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Faxon, Fort Sill, Lake Lawtonka, Meers, Lake Ellsworth, Central High, Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Hulen, Mount Scott, The Visitor Center and Doris Campground.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 9:00 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 9:00 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Comanche, OK; Cotton, OK; Kiowa, OK; Stephens, OK; Tillman, OK

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 9:00 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:00 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Comanche, OK; Cotton, OK; Kiowa, OK; Stephens, OK; Tillman, OK
